title: St Gabriel the Archangel Novena
description: St Gabriel is one of the three Archangels, whom God sent as a messenger to the prophet Daniel in the Old Testament and to Zechariah and Our Lady in the New Testament. Pray the St Gabriel novena for greater devotion to Our Lady.

days.prayer:

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

St. Gabriel the Archangel, I venerate you as the Angel of the Incarnation, because God has specially appointed you to bear the messages concerning the God-Man to Daniel, Zechariah, and the Blessed Virgin Mary. Give me a very tender and devoted love for the Incarnate Word and his Blessed Mother, more like your own. I venerate you also as the Strength from God, because you are the giver of God‚Äôs strength, consoler and comforter chosen to strengthen God‚Äôs faithful and to teach them important truths. I ask for the grace of a special power of the will to strive for holiness of life. Steady my resolutions, renew my courage, comfort and console me in the problems, trials, and sufferings of daily living, as you consoled our Savior in His agony and Mary in her sorrows and Joseph in his trials. I put my confidence in you. St. Gabriel, I ask you especially for this favor: (mention request here‚Ä¶) Through your earnest love for the Son of God and for His blessed Mother, I beg of you, intercede for me that my request may be granted, if it be God‚Äôs holy Will. Pray for us, St. Gabriel the Archangel, that we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.

Almighty and ever-living God, since You chose the Archangel Gabriel from among all the Angels to announce the mystery of Your Son‚Äôs Incarnation, mercifully grant that we who honor Him on earth may feel the benefit of His patronage in heaven. Who live and reign for ever. Amen.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayers From This Novena

My son has a neuromuscular disability, and together‚Äîmy husband, my son, and I‚Äîprayed a Novena to Archangel Gabriel, asking to understand ours and our son‚Äôs purpose in life. Many people have told us that there‚Äôs a special purpose, one meant to glorify the Lord.

After we finished the Novena, my sister, who had no idea we had been praying, sent us a short clip from The Chosen‚Äîwhere Jesus speaks to Little James. What Jesus said in that scene felt like a direct answer to our prayer. When I showed it to my son, he cried.

The message was clear: Be patient. The time will come. Even if healing doesn‚Äôt happen in this lifetime, it will come in Heaven. His suffering is part of his journey toward Heaven. We are not unloved, forgotten, or neglected. It was a powerful reminder that God‚Äôs plan for us, even with all its pain and uncertainty, is filled with love and purpose.

And what makes it even more special is that my sister‚Äôs baptism name is Gabriel. Not only did Jesus speak to us directly (even through an actor), but Archangel Gabriel (my sister‚Äôs name), also delivered the message to us!

from S.T.

My friend‚Äôs parcel arrived safely to me, and my own parcel arrived safely to her! In both cases there were delays that made us fearful that the parcel would be lost in transit, and my delay was even longer than hers. In the end, thankfully, nothing was lost.

from T.S.
